title: Billy Strings Performs “Seven Weeks in County” on Fallon’s Thanksgiving Episode: Watch
description: Strings and his band stopped by The Tonight Show for a stirring performance of the Highway Prayers cut. Billy Strings Performs “Seven Weeks in County” on Fallon’s Thanksgiving Episode: Watch Jo Vito
author: Jo Vito
categories: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon
excerpt: Billy Strings performed his single “Seven Weeks in County” on The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon's Thanksgiving episode.
text: Fresh off releasing his latest album, Highway Prayers, this past September, Billy Strings has stopped by The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon on Thanksgiving night a performance of his song, “Seven Weeks in County.” Taking the Tonight Show stage alongside his band, Strings brought the dark, gritty bluegrass sound of “Seven Weeks in County” to life, leaning into the remorseful Western narrative and playing the musical interludes with impressive ease. Throughout, the interplay of his group is on full display, dynamically ebbing and flowing as each of the instrument’s parts weaved together like a tapestry. Watch the video of the performance below. Get Billy Strings Tickets Here “Seven Weeks in County” arrived as the third single from Highway Prayers, which dropped on September 27th and became the first bluegrass record to hit No. 1 on Billboard’s all-genre Top Album Sales chart since 2002. In other Strings news, his live album, Live Vol. 1, was recently nominated for Best Bluegrass Album at the 2025 Grammy Awards. Up next, he’ll wrap up 2024 with the remainder of this year’s live dates, followed by bookings in 2025 stretching into March. Get tickets here.
html:
Fresh off releasing his latest album, Highway Prayers, this past September, Billy Strings has stopped by The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon on Thanksgiving night a performance of his song, “Seven Weeks in County.”

Taking the Tonight Show stage alongside his band, Strings brought the dark, gritty bluegrass sound of “Seven Weeks in County” to life, leaning into the remorseful Western narrative and playing the musical interludes with impressive ease. Throughout, the interplay of his group is on full display, dynamically ebbing and flowing as each of the instrument’s parts weaved together like a tapestry. Watch the video of the performance below.

Get Billy Strings Tickets Here

“Seven Weeks in County” arrived as the third single from Highway Prayers, which dropped on September 27th and became the first bluegrass record to hit No. 1 on Billboard’s all-genre Top Album Sales chart since 2002.

In other Strings news, his live album, Live Vol. 1, was recently nominated for Best Bluegrass Album at the 2025 Grammy Awards. Up next, he’ll wrap up 2024 with the remainder of this year’s live dates, followed by bookings in 2025 stretching into March. Get tickets here.
